column4: hi all, I had two questions about running 10.10 or 11.04 on a new macbook pro (8,2). 1) I've read a couple forum posts on wireless being an issue, so would 11.04 be a better bet than 10.10 b/c of the newer hardware? 2) Does anyone have any experience with the macbook pro freezes and does that happen in linux as well?
I've been running 8.10 up to 10.10 on my older macbook and everything has been totally fine
modules change per kernel, theres equal chance a module was taken out or put in during the version change whether it works is down to whether it changed or not
good to know, I read the forums a bit more closely to see what has been working
